title: App Configuration
introduction: App Configuration is a centralized feature management and configuration service for use with web and mobile applications, microservices, and distributed environments.

section_highlights.title: Best Practices for Managing Your Feature Flags and Properties Using IBM Cloud App Configuration
section_highlights.description: This blog post discusses the best practices to be followed while using App Configuration on IBM Cloud.

section_highlights.title: IBM Cloud App Configuration: A Deep Dive on Use Cases
section_highlights.description: Exploring some of the most common use cases for IBM Cloud App Configuration.
